column5: Below is my tweet from twitter this AM. I just thought I would share it with you all as it made me think of this group and the awesome things you all do every week.   Nothing is stronger than a group of people that work together! Lets make 2010 the best year ever by supporting each other. Lets start today
OHHHH   that is so tweet! Good thought that we should all live by all of our lives, Dave.
No matter how much these guys bicker at times, when the chips are down, they always do just that.
My wife seems to think I should be doing a little more around the house every week.....  Thanks for the kind words Dave
Good words to live by Dave  Joey
Hey ... our wives must have met at some coffee shop and had a little comparison of their fishing husbands behaviors around the house
